alert.note: Alert for Jasper; Morgan; Newton; Walton (Georgia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued March 23 at 10:41AM EDT by NWS Atlanta
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of western Morgan, southeastern Walton, northern Jasper and southeastern Newton Counties through 1115 AM EDT... At 1041 AM EDT, a strong thunderstorm was over North Alcovy, or 10 miles south of Covington, moving northeast at 55 mph. HAZARD...Up to 40 mph wind, frequent cloud to ground lightning and heavy rain. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect minor damage to tree limbs and blowing around of light, unsecured objects. Heavy rain may cause temporary street flooding especially in poor drainage areas. Locations impacted include... Madison, Social Circle, Rutledge, Newborn, Mansfield, Bostwick, Stewart, Ebenezer, Starrsville, Hard Labor Creek State Park, Brick Store, Calvin, Farrar, Eudora and North Alcovy. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: People outdoors should seek shelter immediately. If you can hear thunder, you are close enough to be struck by lightning. Motorists should slow down and be prepared for possible loss of control due to hydroplaning.
